customhtml2.customHTML:
The New Lone Peak 8

The New
Lone Peak 8

customhtml2_203706348.customHTML: The legend is back and better than ever. Bag larger-than-life trail adventures in the new Lone Peak 8, with a refined upper for durability, a roomy toe box, and a grippy outsole.

customhtml2.customHTML: Shop Men
Shop Women

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML:
Tough as Trails

Bigger miles, bigger trails, bigger adventures. The new Lone Peak 8 is ready for more with a refined upper made from durable ripstop mesh, designed for durability. The longer loop? Sure, were up for it.

customhtml2.customHTML:
Roomy Toe Box

The new Lone Peak 8 gives you a roomy toe box and zero drop, with space through the midfoot, so you can move naturally.

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML:
Roomy Toe Box

The new Lone Peak 8 gives you a roomy toe box and zero drop, with space through the midfoot, so you can move naturally.

Big Confidence

The new Lone Peak 8 still has the same iconic MaxTrac outsole you know and love. Its grippy. Its sticky. Its designed for that all-important underfoot connection so you can get big confidence on even bigger terrain.
